Rachel is thrilled to be back performing with Apple Hill Playhouse. Last season, Rachel performed in Secondary Cause of Death (Captain Henrietta Woolmer-Cardington) and Summer of Love (Holly). Rachel has recently had the honor to take part in the Ligonier Valley Players 50th Season in Harvey as "Nurse Kelly" and in Lend Me a Tenor as "Maggie". Her most recent role with the Valley Players was "Brooke" in Noises Off. Some of Rachel's other on stage roles include: Chicago (Mona), The Underpants (Louise), Murdered to Death (Elizabeth Hartley-Tumpington), The 25th Annual Putnam County Spelling Bee (Olive Ostrovsky), Seussical (Mayzie). In her spare time, Rachel is the Musical Choreographer for Derry Area and Ligonier high schools. When not on stage performing or rehearsing, Rachel is a 1st grade teacher. Rachel would like to thank her wonderful husband, Keith, for his continued support as she pursues her dreams on and off stage!
